::Kluster::

Kluster nodds. "Thank you," he says to Epyon, looking at Angel Prime.

"What do you say," he asks the fiery Maximal, "will you live to fight 
another day or uselessly throw your life away?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Epyon::
> 
> He turned the events over in his head, and came to a decision.
> If this was a full surrender he would fight and die with honor, but 
this
> was a cease fire, a stratagie to live to fight later. And as a 
starship
> captain, he saw where Iron Raptor was coming from.
> He walked over to where Prowl, Kluster, and IR were.
> "I agree with you now. If any of my troops arrive, they will stand 
down
> also."
